subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Phoenix Suns have turned to Lindsey Hunter, a man with 17 years of experience as an N.B.A. player but none as a coach, to take over the flagging team.
snippet: The Phoenix Suns have turned to Lindsey Hunter, a man with 17 years of experience as an N.B.A. player but none as a coach, to take over the flagging team.
